title: Take what you can get
review:
The story centers on Danny a drug runner, transporter, and hitman. Marisela (Carolina Guerra ) the girlfriend of his best friend Don (Ricardo Chavira) convinces Danny to take over the Dominican Republic drug dealing and start his own cartel. Needless to say there are folks in the way.

PLOT SPOILER: This is a case of boy meets girl. Girl meets cool friend of boy. Cocaine. Boy dies, girl dies, they all die. I really couldn't get into lousy protagonists.

Guide: F-word. sex. nudity.
